<header> <h1>WHO AM I</h1> </header> <main> <section> <p>I'm bunnyguy and I'm a tinkering artist!<br>My favorite number is 153 and my favorite color is yellow.</p> <a href="/public/resume.pdf" target="_blank">Download my resume?</a> </section> <section> <h2>Professional jargon</h2> <p>Modified about-me from the <a href="https://hackclub.com/team" target="_blank">Hack Club team page</a>:</p> <q>Bunnyguy is a 17-year-old Viet-American artist and programmer based in the United States.<br> Bunnyguy has previously contributed art for Hack Club programs such as Counterspell, High Seas, and Summer of Making.</q> <p>Back in the summer of 2025, I interned at Hack Club to help organize <a href="https://undercity.hackclub.com/ target="_blank"">Undercity</a>, a 4-day hardware hackathon hosted at GitHub HQ.</p> <h2>Cooler about-me</h2> <p>I don't have any pets, but I own and play with multiple beloved <a href="/tmgc/">Tamagotchi</a>.</p> <p>I'm especially a big fan of the games Mirror's Edge and Portal 2. They have completely altered my brain chemistry.</p> <br> <p>Also see my <a href="/about/listography/">listography</a> for more stuff about me.<p> <br> <p>Click <button type="button">here (link in progress)</button> for a random fact about me:</p> </section> <section id="contact"> <h2>contact</h2> <a href="https://github.com/autowattage" target="_blank">Github</a> <a href="https://neocities.org/site/autowattage" target="_blank">Neocities</a> <a href="https://artfight.net/~autowattage" target="_blank">Artfight</a> <a href="https://youtube.com/@autowattage" target="_blank">Youtube</a> <a href="https://twitter.com/autowattage" target="_blank">Twitter</a> <a href="mailto:hello@sundial.city">hello@sundial.city (say hi! say anything!)</a> <p>For professional inquiries, please mail <a href="mailto:nick@sundial.city">nick@sundial.city</a>.</p> </section> <article> <h2>Bunnyguy NOW!</h2> <p>last update: 01/12/2026, 08:46</p> <ul> <li><strong>Mood</strong>: tired with sore thighs</li> <li><strong>Tamagotchi</strong>: RV3 Neon Stars: Pyonkotchi (Chedder)</li> <li><strong>Current song</strong>: Take Me Back - Ginger Root</li> <li><strong>Current fixations</strong>: Parkour (had my first class on 01/10/2026)</li> <li><strong>Current studies</strong>: none (busy)</li> </ul> <p>I have many, many things to catch up on.
